Play.Header: GB wins the coin toss and elects to defer. PIT elects to Receive, and GB elects to defend the north goal.
2-M.Crosby kicks 72 yards from GB 30 to PIT -2. 84-A.Brown pushed ob at PIT 36 for 38 yards (2-M.Crosby). Return outside the yard markers left sideline.
Pittsburgh Steelers at 15:00, (1st play from scrimmage 14:54)

Play.PlayDescription: (14:54) 7-B.Roethlisberger pass short right to 86-H.Ward to PIT 40 for 4 yards (52-C.Matthews). Pass quick out sideline.
(14:12) 34-R.Mendenhall left tackle to PIT 36 for -4 yards (58-F.Zombo).
(13:29) (Shotgun) 7-B.Roethlisberger pass incomplete short right to 84-A.Brown. Pass incomplete right sideline at the 49; Williams closest defender.
(13:19) (Punt formation) 13-J.Kapinos punts 40 yards to GB 24, Center-60-G.Warren. 38-T.Williams MUFFS catch, and recovers at GB 21.
